ComicInfo.Summary:
Dot and Dash go surfing
Pa is worried about sharks near the beach
An adaptation of the famous short story about a solitary man weary of darkness who is inexorably drawn to a castle tower.
The problems with having an old refrigerator as a style item
Love's obsession
Eleven quotations heard by the author while waitressing
Dot and Dash chase a bird
Ashur invents flourescent slippers
Dot and Dash meet a fox
Pa goes on a fox hunt
Dot and Dash are puzzled by a tortoise
Ashur's cleaning fluid fails
Frank is vilified by all the women in town
A journalist discovers a secret society
Tor Johnson takes a trip to the country
A life saved by the ads in comics
Country singer Rory Randall engenders the wrath of a subterranean dictator
Dot and Dash find a box
Pa goes hunting
